actions.text: The actual numbers about Coronavirus are: @globals.total_confirmed people are confirmed to be infected, @globals.total_deaths deaths have been registered and @globals.total_recovered are recovered from the illness. (as of @(date(today()))).

text: Os dados atuais do Coronavírus são: @globals.total_confirmed pessoas foram diagnosticadas, @globals.total_deaths mortes foram registradas e @globals.total_recovered se recuperaram da doença. (informações atualizadas @(date(today()))).

Ο κορωνοϊός σε αριθμούς:
@globals.total_confirmed επιβεβαιωμένα κρούσματα, @globals.total_deaths δηλωμένοι θάνατοι και @globals.total_recovered έχουν αναρρώσει από τη νόσο.

Конкретните бројки за корона вирусот се: 
@globals.total_confirmed лица се потврдени дека се заразени, регистрирани се @globals.total_deaths deaths смртни случаи, а @globals.total_recovered  закрепнале од болеста. (as of @(date(today()))).

Актуальные цифры по коронавирусу:
подтверждено, что инфицированы @globals.total_confirmed  человек,  зарегистрированы @globals.total_deaths случаев смерти и @globals.total_recovered человек вылечились от болезни. (as of @(date(today()))).

Коронавирус туралы нақты сандар:
@globals.total_confirmed адамдар жұқтырғаны расталды, @globals.total_deaths өлім тіркелді және @globals.total_recovered аурудан айықты. (as of @(date(today()))).

I numeri attuali del coronavirus  sono:
@globals.total_confirmed casi positivi , @globals.total_deaths deaths deceduti  , @globals.total_recovered  guariti. (as of @(date(today()))).

Los números actuales del coronavirus son:
@globals.total_confirmed casos confirmados, @globals.total_deaths fallecimientos registrados, @globals.total_recovered han recuperado. (as of @(date(today()))).

Koronavirüsle ilgili mevcut sayılar şöyledir: @globals.total_confirmed kişiye bulaştığı doğrulanmış, @globals.total_deaths sayıda ölüm kayda geçmiş ve @globals.total_recovered sayıda kişi iyileşmiştir. (as of @(date(today())))
